name: WarBox (itch)
description:
A sandbox game that enables players to watch or take part in a warzone. Players will have access to a variety of tools and features that give them access to customize and change the battlefield however they like.

DISCORD

https://discord.gg/B59r8n7

SANDBOX PAWN INSTRUCTIONS (CURRENT CONTROLS)

- Mouse to look around

- WASD to fly around

- E to elevate Q to descend

- Shift + Scroll will change the speed of the Camera (Move around faster or slower)

- Alt + Scroll will change the game speed (Slow Motion)

- Mouse Wheel Scroll Up/Down switches between 5.56x45mm Projectile and a 30mm Projectile

- Left Click to fire selected Projectile

WHATS INCLUDED/DISCLAIMERS IN CURRENT BUILD 0.0.0.2
- 1 Level of an endless warzone capture the flag

- As many AI as you want

- AI work in squads with the squad leader leading his squad to accomplish the objective

- You can only play as the Sandbox Pawn

- As the Sandbox Pawn you have the ability to spawn projectiles

- Blood spilling was removed temporarily in order to package this build of the game

WHATS TO COME IN THE NEAR FUTURE

- Spawn AI from a menu while playing as the Sandbox Pawn

- Blood Spilling

- Some more features that I can't think of at the moment
